title: This Week's Top Stories - Facebook Bans QAnon, Melania Trump Hates Christmas & Pence-Harris Debate
itunes:title: This Week's Top Stories - Facebook Bans QAnon, Melania Trump Hates Christmas & Pence-Harris Debate
description:
Facebook removes QAnon accounts, Jaboukie Young-White reacts to Melania Trump's anti-Christmas rant, and Mike Pence and Kamala Harris face off in a vice presidential debate.
